Reviews.Title: about the strange sound: zizizizizi….
Reviews.Author: zhuzhu
Reviews.Content: The seller is quite nice. However the camera is not that good.When i take the picture it will make some noise: ziziziizizi. If i take pictures more tan 10 mins, it will be really hot.I also paid $128 import tax for this camera.It not really worth for paying this camera

Reviews.Title: Good camera
Reviews.Author: JIAN X.
Reviews.Content: The delivery was fast, good package, genuine product, perfectly suitable for self-portrait, way much better than previous series. However quite expensive compare to its function.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: XingziSun
Reviews.Content: sometimes the wifi is not work. I only got two days. So far is fine. I like it. BTW it is Japanese version, but I can switch language to English. So it is fine. :)

Reviews.Title: it is not good for taking shoots
Reviews.Author: Plane
Reviews.Content: I dislike it because when I turn on it, it just have a horrible sounds like zizizizi,,zizii,,zziziziizi, I think someting wrong, so I want to return it ASAP, Can you tell me where should I return back?

Reviews.Title: Wife loved it, had so much fun with it at holiday party
Reviews.Author: Kin Leung Tang "Ken Tang"
Reviews.Content: Item looks very nice, wife loved it the moment she saw the box and she had lots of funs at the holiday party with it. Only reason why it does not have 5 stars is the price-tag. The optic quality of the camera should be better at this price point, but it is adequate for sharing the photos taken with the camera on social media sites.

Reviews.Title: nice one
Reviews.Author: Lei Jin
Reviews.Content: that was a wonderful and my wife love it. Thanks for coming so fast in our home.. And the product have new wireless to upload the picture that is so nice.

Reviews.Title: Love!
Reviews.Author: Andrea
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. Of course, it's on the pricey side, however if you make use of the camera's general functions, it's worth it. I would say that this camera is more for taking pictures of yourself/friends/people instead of actual photography. Overall, I am in love with my new camera and it was worth it :)

Reviews.Title: Fancy Camera, Good service
Reviews.Author: Jas
Reviews.Content: This new upgrade camera is another milestone of Casio TR series! So much fun to self-portrait and to beautify image! Although its pretty pricey but this mutifunctional camera can really make your daily life fun and colorful! Use it to record every meaningful moment of life:) The seller is also very courteous and professional. Delivery is also very fast! Worth to have if you consider to buy a digital camera!

Reviews.Title: that's awsome！！！
Reviews.Author: RUIZHI WANG
Reviews.Content: I Love it ！！！！！！！ it's a excellent thing worth to buy！！！ And I really love this color  my friend also like it.
